text: China Electronics Corporation (CEC) is a People's Republic of China's state- owned company and one of the largest producers of telecom equipment in China for both civilian and military purposes.Chinezii care deţin divizia de mobile a Philips: 60% din telefoanele vândute în acest an în România vor fi smart , 12 November 2014, Ziarul financiar, retrieved at 12 November 2014 CEC has four main semiconductor divisions: computer software/hardware & system integration, telecommunication network & terminals and digital home appliances.Smartphone- ul minune creat de chinezi, dar care poartă numele unui gigant european , 26 July 2013, Bogdan Biszok, Capital, retrieved at 12 November 2014 == Acquisition of Philips mobile == CEC acquired the mobile phone division of Philips in 2007.Vânzările de telefoane mobile Philips în România: 10.000 de unități în 6 luni , 11 May 2014, Ziarul financiar, retrieved at 12 November 2014Philips se retrage din productia de telefoane mobile , 12 October 2006, Ziarul financiar, retrieved at 12 November 2014 At the time, the Philips division had an annual revenue of 400 million euros and 240 employees. CEC received the right to sell mobile phones under Philips license. Philips already moved its mobile phones production in China in 2001, when the production, research and development of mobile phones was taken by a joint- venture of Philips and China Electronics Corporation.Philips cierra su fábrica de teléfonos móviles y lleva la producción a China , 27 June 2001, Inés Abril, Cincodias.com, retrieved at 12 November 2014 == CEC in Romania == Romania is the first country in the European Union where Philips mobile phones were sold since 2013, until then the phones were available only in the BRIC states (Brazil, Russia, India and China).România, prima țară din UE în care chinezii care au preluat Philips aduc telefoane mobile , 12 December 2013, Ziarul financiar, retrieved at 12 November 2014 == Controversy == On 28 August, 2020, the United States Department of Defense released the names of additional “Communist Chinese military companies” operating directly or indirectly in the United States. CEC was included on the list. == References == == External links == * Category:Mobile phone manufacturers Category:Semiconductor companies of China Category:Government-owned companies of China Category:Defence companies of China
title: China Electronics Corporation
